ValidationRule.description: NOKIASC-25553: Prevent Asset update when Profile or Permission Set doesn't match.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT ( ISNEW() ) , NOT ( OR ( $Profile.Name = "Integration API Only Profile", $Profile.Name = "Integration API Only Profile (basic)" , $Profile.Name = "Integration API Only Profile - nonNSA", $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "Data Loader Profile", AND ( CH_AssetRecordTypeName__c == "CH_NetworkElementAsset", $Permission.CH_NE_Asset_Admin ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have required access to update Asset.
